Welcome: ^Amelia: Welcome, you must be Ekko! My name is Amelia, and I am the land owner of the farm.
^Let me give you a quick rundown. The farm is a bit of a mess as you can see. I am giving you a discount on your rent for you to clean it up.
^The soil here is prefect for growing cotton. There is plenty of space for you to expand. I recommend you use fertilizer, that way your crops grow faster and make more money.
^Here, we got a big barn that you can use for storage and for your workshop. There are some simple machines left in there that you can use.
^Next to the barn there is a fenced off area for the sheep to graze.
^Lastly, the local shop is just at the edge of the property. You can buy seeds and whatnot in there.
^The shopkeeper is called Vera. She is a bit of naive tree-huger, but not too annoying thankfully.
Question: ^Do you have any questions?
ev
str
^Ekko: How do I progress?
/str
/ev
ev
str
^Ekko: What happens if i can't pay rent?
/str
/ev

c-0: ^Amelia: Vera also sells various upgrades and materials. If you have enough money to spend, these are good investments to make.
c-1: ^Amelia: Well, none of us wants that to happen, do we? Anyway, I would have to evict you then!
c-2: ^Amelia: Good, I have meetings to attend now. I will collect the rent tomorrow morning. Have a good day!
